_sText:
Due to some pointers and criticisms i have revisited my original gg_aerelon_kalel map
it is now labelled gg_aerelon_kalel_2.

------------------------------------
changes in this version:

- Changed the dev textures to dust / aztec style gfx
- Removed the 'adverts' from the map, and kept my 'dev' name on a roof that cant be seen
- Counted the player slots - there are 40 (though the map might be somewhat small for that many lol)
- Made the ground 'not flat' i.e. gave it a little displacement though not much.

Thanks it really, didnt want to change the map, so this is all for this latest changed version

------------------------------------

installation:

extract the rar file directly to the map folder:

C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\username\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

ive included a bot nav file to, i know how annoying they are to generate!

------------------------------------

Overview: 

The map itself isnt massive and offers up some intense gun fighting and close range, 
its been quite popular on our servers and so i have chosen to release it in case anyone 
else wants to try it :D

If someone wants to modify the map file (keeping the original file name and modelling within) 
please contact me for the original hammer file @ info@orion-webhost.com

40 slot gg map

Aerelon Gaming
www.aerelon.com
